abstractText: This method explains how to collect in situ measures of temperature, dissolved oxygen, pH andconductivity at wadeable streams using a multi-probe (e.g.Hydrolab Minisonde).It requires adherence to calibration techniques documented in method ID 3830, Title QC and Calibrating Minisode Multiprobes and FloMate-2000- temperature, pH, conductivity, dissolved oxygen, and velocity.
title: Collecting with Multiprobes and FloMate-2000- temperature, pH, conductivity, dissolved oxygen, and velocity v1.0
